WYSIWYM.model
Class UndeterminedDTNode

java.lang.Object
  WYSIWYM.model.Node
      WYSIWYM.model.DTNode
          WYSIWYM.model.UndeterminedDTNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
TreeComponent
public class UndeterminedDTNode
extends DTNode

UndeterminedDTNode is a node in the Dependency Tree whose referring expression (i.e. its final surface form) has not been assigned yet. It holds all information needed at a later stage to determine that referring expression: proper name and pronoun of the object (if known), the type and the SG id.

Version:
1.4 2008/07/25
Author:
Feikje Hielkema

setExpression

public void setExpression(Map<String,List<UndeterminedDTNode>> previousTree,
                          DependencyTreeTransformer dt)
Returns an appropriate referring expression. This method makes some heavy assumptions. The topic of a paragraph is always presented by a pronoun, and no other node is. Proper checking of salience was too complex to implement as this project focuses on other, aggregation issues.

Parameters:
previousTree - HashMap with the UndeterminedDTNodes of the previous Dependency Tree
dt - This DependencyTreeTransformer

makeNP

                   String determiner,
                   String mod,
                   DependencyTreeTransformer dt)
Returns a noun phrase containing a proper referring expression for this node

Parameters:
noun - The noun
determiner - The determiner
mod - A modifier, or null if there is none
dt - DependencyTreeTransformer to which the node is added.

setConjunctNr

public void setConjunctNr()
Computes the conjunct nr, which is relevant when choosing a referring expression. -1 for the paragraph topic, else the order of the conjunct it is part of, or if that is not the case 0 by default.

setConjunctNr

public void setConjunctNr(int i)
Sets the conjunct nr, which is relevant when choosing a referring expression.

Parameters:
i - conjunct number

Returns:
conjunct number
